DataElement.preferredName: Cellular Morphology Complete Remission First Observed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date a morphologic complete remission (CR) was first observed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cellular Morphology Complete Remission First Observed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the first morphologic (cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function) complete remission (the disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment) observed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function, or the scientific study thereof.:The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured.

Concepts.definition: Cellular morphology is the form and structure of cells, and its relation to cell function, or the scientific study thereof.
The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Observed; discovered or determined by scientific observation.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Ascertained or determined through monitoring or observation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
